Last Thursday, my friend Kobe Bryant asked me if I would like to join him for lunch at his place. I replied in the affirmative. I ate some snacks beforehand to take the edge of my hunger. We washed two bags of tuna salad and left them to dry out before consuming it. In this way the salad contains more nutrients than when you eat it right after opening the bags.  We cut the meat into dice, peeled and diced the potatoes and chopped the onions. We were careful because the knife has a razor-edge edge. The inside of the meat is raw while the outer surface is cooked. Onions can be eaten raw or cooked. After lunch I said "I'll wash you dry" He came to the kitchen and stood beside me drying up the cutlery and utensils while I washed. Since it's best to dry your clothes out the day before by hanging them on the clothes line I went ahead and helped him do that. We then joined his sister on a run along the promenade which felt relaxing. I bought a pair of trainers for her who said she'd pay me back if I got her those sneakers. Looks like she sold me a pup - then I bought a Chanel watchstrap but Im' wondering if this really is genuine. I might have been sold a bill of goods. After running I gave her a foot massage and dried her feet on her brother's quilt lol and a towel. On that evening we joined with her dad in doing a ten thousand piece jigsaw puzzle. It felt thoroughly enjoyable. Kobe's elder brother is a marketing manager at Hilton. I enjoy his company. He uses photoshop every day for poster and banner design as photoshop is worth its weight in gold in digital marketing. The party poster he designed for the hotel is fabulous. The gold words are sharply defined on the black background. I admire his ambition and dogged determination to succeed. He never gets sidetracked by unimportant issues. In addition, he enjoys participating in debates. Just the other week he wiped the floor with all opposition during a debate about the existence of god. It was pretty impressive. His best friend is his Alaskan Malamute. He towels off the dog after its bath. Today dogs certainly don't come cheap including getting them spayed or neutered and any medications they take when they have a condition. Kobe's dad is a physics professor who along with his team are currently solving an exceedingly difficult math question for all they're worth. Hopefully they'll find an answer to it soon. Besides physics he's an avid football fan. His favourite team Budapest is currently top of the league whereas Milan is bottom of the league. Madrid is lying third in the league this year. Recently Barcelona edged Rome four-three. Barcelona edged its rival Rome into second place. The league championship is the opportunity for all the best teams in the league to strut their stuff. Kobe's younger brother has opened a beauty parlour. Hopefully it attracts lots of customers since he bet the farm on it. His uncle was broke several years ago because he bet the ranch on his company which went bankrupt later. He managed to honour his debts in three years. His elder sister is an estate agent who earns a basic salary of eleven thousand nine hundred dollars per month plus a three percent commission on every deal she makes so she doesn't work on commission only. Last year her sales fell below the expectations of her company partly because the economy was hardly blooming.She's a fan of Jacqueline Wong. Have you heard of the sex scandal involving her and Andy Hui? She was having an affair with Andy who's married to Sammi. It caused a scandal which ended her career overnight. They were without doubt an item.As a result many people think it's time for her to hang up her spurs.In fact her friend Alan hung up his spurs several years ago because of a sex scandal. Kobe's brother-in-law is an iphone salesman who gets an hourly wage of fifty dollars plus a twenty percent commission on the iphones he sells so his job isn't by commission only.So far this year his profits has fulfilled his expectation.

冇JJB 決定要罷睇入樽賽了

I stayed in LeBron James' mansion for a few nights. On the morning of the first day, the water pipe attached to his next-door's neighbour's stainless steel canopy was dripping water down the wall onto the floor in LeBron's garden so he asked if he could enter their garden and wipe the edge of the canopy and the water pipe and mop them so as to stop water from leaking from them. I too entered their garden and helped him mop the water pipe and the edge of the canopy so as to stop water from leaking out of them. There was a leak in their canopy so they had a bucket underneath for the water to drop into but the bucket was overflowing all over the floor so we placed another bucket beside it  but very soon water began to overflow from the bucket which caused flooding. I tried to soak up the water with towels but it was impossible. Water soaked into my shoes. Rain also soaked through his shoes and clothes. Some of his neighbors said they had a leak in their house as well. About three hours later Tomio called and said he finally got a promotion. The opportunity that he had waited for so long has finally come along..Opportuntues like this don't always come along. After he left zara his friend came alomg in his car and offered him a lift to a bar and celebrated with him. I enjoy strolling hand in hand with my girlfriend along the nearby beach. In fact I went for a leisurely stroll there earlier. With only my thoughts for company I lay down on the beach reading a book which felt thoroughly enjoyable. Tomio arrived on the late afternoon. I didn't know he had company. As he was the last person to leave the house I kept him company until the bus arrived.  I asked LeBron if the hurricane that happened a little whole ago do any damage to his house. He said some tree branches and twigs tumbled down during the typhoon so he had to give his garden a good cleanup afterwards. Some tree trunks toppled over in the nearby park as a results of the typhoon.

Kobe Bryant's brother and I have been wanting to go on a cruise across the Pacific Ocean exploring new islands for a long time but the cruise ships which we've looked at are all out of commission. Dream cruise is out of commission by broken components and power failures and won't be in commission until October. Costa cruise which is also out of commission for repairs is expected to be back in commission in July. Oh well.

LeBron James' brother is my friend. He's been wondering about retrofitting his boxing gym with a ring as it makes sparring more effective. A retrofit for his personal gym room is necessary too which involves putting in a lat pulldown machine. The book "basketball techniques" is worth reading as it teaches you the correct and effective ways of shooting three point shots.
